# wger image attribution

This project caches selected exercise images from the wger open API:
- Source API: https://wger.de/api/v2/
- License: Creative Commons (as provided per image metadata in wger)

Mapped images (cached locally):
- warmup_slr -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/377/
- a_leg_press -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/371/
- a_leg_curl -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/366/
- a_glute_bridge -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/1642/
- a_calf_raise -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/622/
- b_lat_pull -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/1350/
- b_chest_press -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/1655/
- b_ohp -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/567/
- b_trap_bar_dl -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/184/
- c_plank -> https://wger.de/api/v2/exerciseinfo/458/

All remaining exercises keep the local SVG fallback placeholders.
